summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1209, for the improvement of East Galer Street, from Fifteenth Avenue North to Seventeenth Avenue North, all in the City of Seattle, by grading, curbing, and constructing concrete sidewalks, under Ordinance No. 13305 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
